<h3 id="X38126">X(38126) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(3), X(8), X(9)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^6+(b+c)*a^5-(7*b^2+12*b*c+7*c^2)*a^4+4*(b+c)^3*a^3+(5*b^2+8*b*c+5*c^2)*(b-c)^2*a^2-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(5*b^2+2*b*c+5*c^2)*a+(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38126) = X(3)+2*X(24393) = X(8)+2*X(31658) = X(9)+2*X(5690) = 4*X(10)-X(5805) = 3*X(10)-X(38151) = 2*X(40)+X(31672) = 4*X(140)-X(3243) = X(1482)-4*X(6666) = 3*X(5805)-4*X(38151) = 3*X(26446)-X(38030) = 2*X(38030)-3*X(38122) = 2*X(38031)-3*X(38067) = X(38037)-3*X(38057) = 2*X(38037)-3*X(38108) = 3*X(38057)-2*X(38179) = 3*X(38066)-X(38121) = 3*X(38067)-4*X(38130) = 3*X(38097)-X(38154) = 3*X(38097)-2*X(38175) = 3*X(38108)-4*X(38179)</b>
<p>X(38126) lies on these lines: {3,24393}, {8,31658}, {9,5690}, {10,5805}, {30,38097}, {40,31672}, {140,3243}, {511,38190}, {515,38210}, {516,3654}, {517,38037}, {518,10202}, {519,38031}, {527,38066}, {952,21153}, {971,5657}, {1001,12000}, {1482,6666}, {1698,20330}, {2550,10526}, {3617,5759}, {5762,38112}, {5818,18482}, {5840,38211}, {5844,38113}, {5846,38117}, {5854,38131}, {5855,38132}, {5856,38128}, {5857,38129}, {6594,19914}, {7672,11374}, {7956,30393}, {10573,15837}, {11231,38053}, {11495,18518}, {12245,18230}, {19875,38036}, {28194,38158}, {28212,38139}, {28234,38059}, {38041,38093}, {38042,38150}</p>
<p>
X(38126) = midpoint of X(5657) and X(5686)<br>
X(38126) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (38031, 38130), (38037, 38179), (38053, 11231), (38108, 38057), (38122, 26446), (38150, 38042), (38154, 38175), (38200, 38112)<br>
X(38126) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (38031, 38130, 38067), (38037, 38057, 38179), (38037, 38179, 38108), (38097, 38154, 38175)<br>
</p>
